強跟有趣是矛盾的兩回事
I cant launch this and i dont know why?

The Good

Presence

Something dead by daylight does very well is the chase. You can argue that certain map set ups dampen this but when a killer is near you start to feel a level of pressure. The heartbeat system, mixed with the red stain all coupled with the knowledge that once you're dead, you're dead really gives a sense of lethality to it all. 

Hiding has the same effect. When you are hiding from an enemy in a game the AI is clear,. You get angry when they see you from a fluke or blatantly broken detection, yet they are sometimes supremely easy to walk past. On top of this an AI will leave after a set time...humans don't...you might hide away from a killer but if they know you MUST be around tree somewhere because they saw you scurry out of sight. It ups the ante-and tension- when something is truly looking for you.


PERKS

The perk system is addicting and enthralling. Every match you get blood points and blood points allow you to buy both offerings, items, and perks. I played this game before the big buff where most perks weren't really that good but now perks are viable and stuff that you never considered before are even fun with certain mix up over the meta-choices. 

There are many, many perks. Both in the base game but added over time from personal character perks. You won't have access to all perks due to unlocking  personal perks is needed by leveling up one character or by buying them in shrine of secrets with shards-in game currency you collect- Discovering perks is fun but due to the fast pace and extensive library this slow build up probably won't really be noticed by you yet so it's a good time to get the hang of this indepth choice.

You can set 4 perk slots, allowing for odd themes and approaches.


Constant Dev Support


When I first joined Dead by Daylight the game was not in a very good state. The killers actions were slow, the flash light blinding affect was so white it litterally hurt your eyes, and most perks were not even worth looking at outside of playing with gimmick builds. In the last few updates they have made very sensible but simple changes that stopped the game being a killer bullyfest.

Before as killer you had to eat pallets while groups of people shined flash lights in your eyes and then get DC'ed and hooked blocked. Effectively making it impossible to win or sometimes even get one kill by players that knew the meta. While some of this meta still exists the faster pace, quicker actions and buffs really show. Now it's very feasible to beat a group despite certain meta-peerks even at high levels.

They consistently add new killers and new survivors along with new perks for each-to buy but you can get these with shard grinds- along with seasonal events,new maps(free) and the occasional update changing things up. 

Even if you disagree or agree with the devs the last few updates really make me feel like the game is being treated with attention and its fan base listened into. Now if you think they heard the right things is up to you. 


The Bad


Envriomental Stagnation

The game has many maps with many different layouts, this is true. But at its core all maps and all games consist of the same thing. Distilling the more thrilling diveristy of perks and killers with the same approaches. All survivors have to get a bunch of generators on map, all maps have 3 obstacles-survivor tools-

Closet: you can hide in these but if caught are instant grabbed.

Pallets: you can drop these running, walking or standing infront of a killer to stop them. Most of these are in safe zones where you can both just run circles forever and the survivor can vault over it.

or ontop of a killer to stun them. A killer can break a pallet with a 2/4 second breaking animation that slows them down and decreases blood lust.

In essence... a pallet is a safe zone or full stop which the killer must mind game you around or break-letting you escape-

Vaultable ledges: not much to say here. Except for one killer all other killers can only vault slowly. It's not really feasible to chase pass these.

Because there is only 1 type of objective and 3 type of obstacles the game turns down to meta really, really fast. Good players will always just avoid doing anything as long as possible, not committing to any action or direction. Typically this leads to a killer and survivors running round and round something like a scooby doo chase then them dropping a pallet last second to stun you. This tactic pretty much assures pallets don't get used up too quickly and the killer loses precious time while his team mates work on generators.

High level survivors will get gens done very quickly and it's mostly high levels that will do this. One chase can cost you the game. It really boils down to killer leaving and the survivors not using this tactic out of boredom.

But is it survivors fault? 

I don't think so. Stuff like circle looping for a minute straight is more of a symptom that pallet tours exist to begin with-the map is filled with just pallets due to low obstacle options to place- Survivors use the only tool they have to max effectivenes and because pallets are almost cut off by large swarmths of unmovable props it means as killer you can only eat shit and get stunned or watch the survivor stand there and run around the pallet for 30 seconds or so.

It kind of kills the atmosphere. With games like Last Year coming out it really shows how little enviroment there is in dead by daylight. While it's not possible to translate some of those things over because of the vast difference in base style between them it does exaggerate it's staleness.

While there are killers and survivors with plenty of perks to change themselves and killers with powers to change how things go.

There is virtually NO...none...added obtistacles or items to help this game health that I know of. Really, even 2 new obstacles that are generated at random to divide up the normal spawn numbers of stuff would help at this point.


No New Items


Items are a thing in dead by daylight. As survivor they aid or allow certain actions. As killer they modify or change killers power.


The survivor items are: healing kits, mechanics boxes, flash lights, maps, and the very rare hatch keys.

Two of those items do something you already do but faster and the last one is a rare power item that lets you escape early if you can find the hatch. 

Flash lights can stun killer and mapss reveal aura after you scouted an area.

Might got some details wrong there. There are a few seasonal items you can get but they are limited to seasonal events. I think that, in it's current state survivors almost rely more on perks than items which kind of reduces the need for them in terms of fun. They only serve a competitive purpose to escape quicker or heal.

The flash light is the only exception to this. This is strange because as killer you can get items-most of the time rare and specific to certain characters- that DO drastically alter the game. As the PIG you can reduce your head traps to 1 but see people in a radius when you're sneaking.

As Trap you can make equipped an item to your power that makes it so the random inactive traps open randomly.

It's strange that we haven't seen any updates that do add stranger game altering items to it-especially for survivors-like items that offer them different evasion, distraction or sneaking tools. 


Dead by Daylight is a unique game with a lot to offer, a lot of care put into it, and lot of good ideas that sometimes struggle under needed growing pains.

One morning I just woke up in the middle of nowhere, Nice. Walked around to find out where the hell I was. Found a person. But not any normal person, someone rapidly squatting when they found me..? No idea why or how they could squat so fast but impressive nothing the less. We decided to walk around after I asked them where we were and they just gave me the silent treatment and we found a generator, my natural and their natural instinct kicked in and bam! It was up and running! But as soon as It was finished and I decided to rest for abit some random orchestra crowd or something started playing and behold some fucking 7 foot guy wrapped in thin ass dirty blankets slashed some weird shit at me and cut me pretty severely, I tried to run but no use, I fell to the ground and had him pick me up for some odd reason. After a few seconds of him carrying me around he tossed me like superman onto a damn hook, A DAMN HOOK? The guys got the strength of someone going out to a gym for 50 years I swear but I just hung there in shock. A few minutes pass by and another person just somehow yoinked me off the damn thing! Does everybody have super powers now a days or super strength? But oh well I asked what the fuck was that thing, all they did was point to a door. We ran and ran out to that door as I heard another pair of screams behind me as I exited along with some bing bongs after said screams. We continued running for abit untill suddenly they just engulfed into flames and dissappeared, I saw my house in the distance and ran to it, got in my chair and posted this review. 10/10 Good game killer.

Oh boy its pain o clock

Эта захватывающая игра заставит вас испугаться.... в самом начале. Да да, потом вы уже не будете испытывать страх. Это, безусловно, один из главных минусов данной игры. Хоррор на самом деле не такой уж и хоррор, разве, что вас не нанизывают всякий раз на крюк. Однако, эта игра игра заслуживает внимание. Опустим, что в игре игроки всякий раз должны выполнять одни и те же действия. Игра поглощает своей атмосферностью и великолепной графикой. И конечно, совершенно оригинальным сюжетом. Жаль, что каждый месяц ранг игрока падает до начального - 20, лично я за месяц смог дойти лишь до 15. Но, это безусловно является мотивацией - для опытных игроков снова занять свои позиции. К плюсам данного хоррора можно отнести и постоянные, но не бесконечные обновления. Таким образом, игра не надоедает, становится более лучше, увеличиваются возможнасти игрока и появляются новые персонажи. Но всё равно, какой бы не была Dead by Daylight динамичной игрой, сюжет на каждой орене один и тот же! Это надоедает, заставляет постоянно бросать игру.... и возвращаться к ней снова. Всякий раз, играя в роли выжившего, вы должны починить генераторы, стараясь не попасть в лапы убийцы, открыть ворота и сбежать. Все до боли просто, но одновременно сложно. Ведь так как данный хоррор многопользовательская онлайн игра, прятаться игроки должны от реального игрока. И тут, я подвожу вас к ещё одному минусу данной игры. Ранжирование игроков хоть и есть, начинающим игрокам частенько подсовывают опытного убийцу.... Также обращаю ваше внимание на то, что хоррор требует много оперативной памяти, и может лагать если у вас слабый ПК. Настоятельно не рекомендую устанавливать на слабый ноутбук, для этого должны быть железные нервы. А теперь давайте подведем итоги.

Плюсы:
+ атмосферность, графика
+ оригинальный сюжет
+ простота цели игры
+ постоянная мотивация играть
+ постоянное улучшение

Минусы:
- страх только в начале игры
- надоедающий сюжет
- некачественное ранжирование игроков
- не подходит для слабых ПК

Dead by Daylight - это:
1. Маньяк бьет своим маленьким кинжаликом за километр
2. Ты можешь спокойно спрятаться в траве и тебя никто не заметит
3. Дерево - наше все
4. Ты можешь бегать всю катку от маньяка вокруг дерева, как будто вы призываете самого Сатану
5. Ты - пушечное мясо, пока все остальные чинят
6. Быть одержимостью маньяка несколько каток подряд, а может дней, месяцев, годов...
7. Ты либо хороший сурв, либо хороший маньяк. Другого не дано
8. Когда ты только начинаешь играть и ссыкуешь выходить из укрытыя, как только слышишь небольшое сердцебиение
9. Психовать, когда ты остался последний и уже было вышел в люк, но не тут то было, ведь маньяк - кемпер
10. Даже если ты ушел вообще в другую часть карты от крюка и все равно всех убил, тебе будут писать "Nice camp, asshole"
11. Ненавидеть Мясокомбинат Гидеон со свинкой вместе
12. Заводить/чинить генераторы сурвами, у которых даже нет на это образования и хз как у них это получается
13. Наяривать круги по стеночке вокруг карты и не выходить на центр, только если в случае особой необходимости

Dead by Daylight, ist echt ein mega geiles Spiel. 
das Horrorgame schlecht hin, wie ichfinde. Zumindest wenn es multiplayer geht. Freitag der 13 ist meiner meinung nach hierfür keine konkurrenz. daduch das es immer wieder neue DLC's gibt wird es auch nicht "langweilig". ja, die DLC's sind kostenpflichtig.Ob das gerechtfertigt ist möchte ich nicht diskutieren.
Das Spiel an sich ist Grafisch so wie auch performance mäßig echt gut dabei und hat kein grund sich zu verstecken. Natürlich hat auch dieses Spiel baustellen wie z.B. das die Internet verbindung oft nicht ausreicht zum spielen. Da dies aber leider nicht an meinem Internet liegt (ich habe inzwischen schon zweimal gewchselt) finde ich es schade das man dann aus der jeweiligen Runde rausgeschmissen wird, oder wenn man als Killer spielt das Überlebnde rausgeschmissen werden.
Auch ein Thema das wellnen geschlagen hat war der Ladebalken und ich stimme auch zu es ist auf eine Art schon traurig das es ein Jahr gedauert hat bis dieser eingeführt wurde. 
Aber ich finde das sind kleiner Baustellen. Ich spiele das Spiel wirklich gerne und ich kann es auch ur jedem empfehlen der auf Horrorgames steht.
Es lohnt sich alle mal für Dead by Daylight ein wenig geldauszugeben.

Очень хорошая игра. 
Большое количество убийц и выживших, различная одежда для них, перки, собственные перки и разные ивенты.
Возможность поиграть как за выжившего, так и за маньяка очень радует.
Хороший саундтрек. Радует то ,что игра не очень лёгкая, ведь убийцы или выжившие бывают очень хитрыми, что не мало важно в этой игре.

Но есть и минусы в этой игре.
Иногда очень долго искать выживших за маньяка.
Подбешивают кемперы, которые постоянно стоят возле тебя.

Но игра стоит своих денег, но можно было бы сделать и бесплатные длс с персонажами:)

First of all,the community of this game is atleast as toxic as csgo's....
So the killers usually just camping next to your hooked character and watching you,or if you somehow get saved by a teammate it doesn't matter cause the killer is going to chase only you as far as you die.
And all the time your random teammates have average about 10iq so they will just walking in the map or just cleansing tomtems (especially the hunted ground totems) and let you die at your first time in the hook...
So if you would like to keep your brain cells intact just do not buy this game..and it is pay to way anyways so....Also the rank system is a piece of cake...
This game is a bug simulator as well,so don't be suprised about the trash hitboxes and about the lags...

This update destroyed the game... Any new player will now have huge truble to start and the old ones that were playing this game once or twice a week and got a decent level have now no chances to level up...
Das spiel hat zwar mal ab und zu seine kleinen Probleme, aber das Spiel macht sehr viele Spaß:-)
像这样考验人性的游戏真的不多，是和队友一起行动，加速修机互相救助，还是自己偷偷藏匿，保住性命寻找地道，甚至和屠夫绕板子蛇皮走位都需要心理战，被挂起来的时候能看到队友的状态真的是很贴心了，每个屠夫的背景故事真的有代入感，推荐列表

欢迎大家来到黎明暖暖的学院QvQ,在这里你能遇到煤老板（你确定不是苦工？）的小瘸瘸和马戏团的驯兽师？夹哥；哦，不要在意你的身后，那只是你的班主任而已你可以称他为小白脸，这里就是我们的图书馆，来和大家打个招呼吧小叮当~接下来就是我们的食堂~我们有最专业的厨师：皮脸和李奶奶~以及最强社会人小猪佩奇~诶诶，同学你怎么昏倒了？来来来，去我们的医疗院看一下吧，我们有专业的医生：杨教授和护士以及医疗设施，对了晚上你可能会作噩梦哦~请不要紧张那只是弗莱迪在作怪而已，如果你感到孤单的话，我们有可爱的兔子姐姐哦可以陪你~忘了自我介绍了，我是这里的学员：桂言叶，还请多多指教，我们还有好多的学员，我来带你认识吧~（笑）
